greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest power of n with initial digit = 1 in decimal representation.
mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{k = 1}, While[IntegerDigits[n^k][[1]] != 1, k++ ]; n^k]; Table[ f[n], {n, 30}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Sep 01 2004 *)
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 30 2004
